documents.document: @TheThirstyWench ...perspective, nothing offends me more than lecherous dicks claiming to be "real men". Lowers us all to level of creeps
@TheThirstyWench @Ben_T_Johnson Know I'm part of the problem for being the spokesperson for one of the offenders, but from a personal (1/2)
@eportelance @groulxsome @Ben_T_Johnson Fully agree. But when you want to be Drake of Craft Beer, this is how you build a rep as a "mogul".
@eportelance @groulxsome @Ben_T_Johnson It's buying an LCBO listing, I'm sure nothing more. Gives lost craft another spot on the shelf

@davidsunlee @crystalluxmore Are you trying to tell me that Activia and Jamie Lee Curtis have been lying to me?
Hey @crystalluxmore , one thing I've never gotten a straight answer on: is sour beer pro-biotic? Can I consider it good for the gut?
@TheThirstyWench @_VictoriaBrews Must be a triple threat: able to act, sing, troubleshoot draught system.
@chucksahoy That's awesome! Be sure to try pretty much everything!
@TheThirstyWench Yup. Inspired by Hamilton, it will be a hip-hop musical on the History of craft beer. Opening track: Fritz and the Maytags
Planning something really cool with work right now, can't wait to tell everyone about it. Soon...not yet...but soon.
Looking for two tix to #RHCBF for me and the lady. Not working the event so can't get in like usual. Any help is welcome! Will trade beer
